t=input()
for _ in xrange(t):
    n=input()
    if n%7==0:
        x=7*(n/7)
    elif n%7==1:
        x=7*(n/7-1)
    elif n%7==2:
        x=7*(n/7-2)
    elif n%7==3:
        x=7*(n/7-3)
    elif n%7==4:
        x=7*(n/7)
    elif n%7==5:
        x=7*(n/7-1)
    elif n%7==6:
        x=7*(n/7-2)

    if x<0:
        print "-1"
    else:
        print x
